text: KNOCKING TRANSLUCENT, CLEAR ACROSS THE ROOM. We can tell, from the CRUNCH of his body on the windshield, from the T against a collapsing shelf of ELECTRONICS. Butcher climbs out of the car. For some reason, he holds sparking CATTLE PROD (stay tuned for why).

CLOSE ON HUGHIE. Darting past boxes and equipment, about escape out the back. He opens the door =-— And STOPS. Who is he gonna be? Someone who backs down? Or someone who fights? When he sees, on a rack infront of him -- some CARBON COMPONENT CABLES. He looks at them. Thinking.

SPARKS CLIMACTICALLY RIDE UP Translucent’s body. Before he DROPS. Dust-settling beat. The sprinklers stop. Nothing on the floor but a puddle wi the outline of an invisible body in it.

STARLIGHT. On the ROOF of the Seven Tower -- taking in th infinite constellation of the city below. PUSH IN ON HER. Her anger, her frustration, boiling and churning inside. Rising up. Her eyes begin to glow. Then FLARE. WIDE. The tower’s top floors -- really, all nearby lights FLICKER and BLACK OUT dramatically. Around Starlight. As she draws energy from them. As her eyes BLAZE like FIRE. The other Supes might not see theydefiant spark inside he Not yet. But we sure do.
